Module kivakit.resource
Package com.telenav.kivakit.filesystem.spi

Interface FolderService

All Superinterfaces:
com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Broadcaster, com.telenav.kivakit.core.value.count.ByteSized, com.telenav.kivakit.core.time.CreatedAt, Deletable, FileSystemObjectService, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Listener, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.MessageTransceiver, com.telenav.kivakit.core.time.Modifiable, com.telenav.kivakit.core.time.ModifiedAt, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.naming.Nameable, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.naming.NamedObject, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.messaging.Receiver, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Repeater, ResourcePathed, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Transceiver, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.messaging.Transmitter, UriIdentified
All Known Implementing Classes:
LocalFolder
public interface FolderService extends FileSystemObjectService
A service provider interface (SPI) for filesystem folders. In addition to the methods required by FileSystemObjectService, this interface requires:
  • clear() - Remove all files in this folder
  • file(FileName) - The file with the given name
  • files() - All files in this folder
  • files(Matcher) - All files matching the given matcher
  • folder(Folder) - The given sub-folder
  • folder(FileName) - The given sub-folder
  • folders() - All folders in this folder
  • isEmpty() - True if the folder is empty
  • isWritable() - True if the folder can be written to
  • mkdirs() - Creates this folder and all the parent folders as needed
  • nestedFiles(Matcher) - All nested files in this folder matching the given matcher
  • nestedFolders(Matcher) - All nested folders in this folder matching the given matcher
  • renameTo(FolderService) - Renames this folder to the given folder
  • temporaryFile(FileName) - A temporary file with the given base name
  • temporaryFolder(FileName) - A temporary folder with the given base name
Author:
jonathanl (shibo)
